name: A-star
tagline: A path finding for hex map by using A star Algorithm
body:
# A-Star
A path finding for hex map by using A star Algorithm
# Language
'Html' + 'javascript' + 'css'
# How to run
Open the **HexMap.html** using 'Internet Explorer' to see the result
# Usage
See the **javascript.js** file to understand the Algorithm
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
